LanguageData.AMXB_ForceRelationsDesc: Forces racial relations to match Lore more closely
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowAdeptusAstartesDesc: Allows forces of the Adeptus Astartes to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowAdeptusMechanicusDesc: Allows forces of the Adeptus Mechanicus to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowAdeptusMilitarumDesc: Allows forces of the Adeptus Militarum to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowAdeptusSororitasDesc: Allows forces of the Adeptus Sororitas to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowChaosMarineDesc: Allows forces of the Chaos Space Marines to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowChaosMechanicusDesc: Allows forces of the Dark Mechanicus to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowChaosGuardDesc: Allows forces of the Traitor Guardsmen to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowChaosDeamonsDesc: Allows forces of the Chaos Deamons to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowDarkEldarDesc: Allows forces of the Dark Eldar to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowEldarCraftworldDesc: Allows forces of the Craftworld Eldar
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowEldarWraithguardDesc: Give Craftworld Eldar Access to Wraithgaurd units
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowEldarExoditeDesc: Adds an Exodite Eldar population to the planet
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowEldarHarlequinnDesc: Harlequinn Eldar are known to frequent this planet
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowNecronWellBeBackDesc: Enables Necron We'll be Back special rule
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowOrkDesc: Orkz: Ork/Feral Orkz Factions and Ork Rok incident
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowOrkTekDesc: Tek Orkz to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowOrkFeralDesc: Feral Orkz to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowTauDesc: Tau to spawn in new games: Enables Tau Faction
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowGueVesaDesc: Allows Gue'Vesa to spawn as part of the Tau Empire
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowKrootAuxiliariesDesc: Allows Kroot to spawn as part of the Tau Empire
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowKrootDesc: Allows Independant Kroot Factions to spawn during world generation
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowVespidDesc: Allows Vespid to spawn as part of the Tau Empire
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowVespidAuxiliariesDesc: Allows Independant Vespid Factions to spawn during world generation
LanguageData.AMXB_AllowTyranidDesc: Tyranids to spawn in new games
